snippet: Paul Taylor is the subject of a retrospective of sorts coming to Lincoln Center that presents 22 of his pieces.
abstract: Paul Taylor Dance Company trades its usual City Center home for the David H Koch Theater in Lincoln Center, staging a retrospective of sorts that presents 22 of the choreographer's pieces, as well as unveils three of his most recent dances.
lead_paragraph: Paul Taylor is the subject of a retrospective of sorts coming to Lincoln Center that presents 22 of his pieces.

headline.seo: Paul Taylor Dance Company Comes to Lincoln Center
headline.main: Looking Back With Darkness And Insects
headline.print_headline: Looking Back With Darkness And Insects
